mapper.select: select id, create_time, deliver_time, serve_time, status, good_num, address_id, integral, rush, refund_status, refund_type, refund_reason, refund_images, refund_time from bu_user_order where 1 = 1 and user_id = #{userId} and id = #{orderId}

select sum(CASE WHEN o.status = 1 and o.refund_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBePaidCount, sum(CASE WHEN o.status = 2 and o.refund_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBeSendCount, sum(CASE WHEN o.status = 3 and o.refund_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBeReceivedCount, sum(CASE WHEN o.refund_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBeService from bu_user_order o where 1 = 1 and o.deleted = false and o.user_id = #{userId}
